nodes.text: Sardu Sallowe's miniature sandcrawler was a sandcrawler that belonged to the Tusken bounty hunter Sardu Sallowe. It was a modified TaggeCo Survey-class crawler, and could hold up to 16 Jawa assistants and 10 prisoners. It was 7 meters high and 40 meters long, and could hold up to 20 metric tons worth of cargo.
